practice_phrases: That sounds beautiful.
听起来美。
That sounds interesting.
听起来有趣。
That sounds really beautiful.
听起来真正美。
I think that sounds beautiful.
我觉得听起来美。
That sounds like the most interesting show.
听起来像最有趣的演出。
If you try, that sounds beautiful.
如果你努力，听起来美。
Then that sounds interesting.
那么听起来有趣。
That sounds like the way you try to help.
听起来像你努力帮助的方式。
I love the way that sounds.
我喜欢听起来的方式。
That sounds really important when it matters.
听起来在它重要的时候真正重要。
Which of those places sounds the most interesting?
那些地方中哪个听起来最有趣？
What happens next? That sounds interesting.
接下来会发生什么？听起来有趣。
After the first part of the show, that sounds beautiful.
在演出的第一部分之后，听起来美。

seed_context.known: 听起来好像你需要睡一觉。
seed_context.target: That sounds as though you need to get some sleep.

practice_phrases: As though you try.
好像你努力。
As though it's beautiful.
好像它美。
As though you lose.
好像你输。
It's as though you really try to help.
好像你真正努力帮助。
That sounds as though you love it.
听起来好像你喜欢它。
As though you trust anyone.
好像你相信任何人。
I think it's as though you're planning to lose.
我觉得好像你打算输。
As though what happens next really matters.
好像接下来会发生的真正重要。
That sounds as though the show is really interesting.
听起来好像演出真正有趣。
As though you're standing on the other side.
好像你站在另一边。
It's as though you're under the bridge right now.
好像你现在在桥下。
Then it's as though you will never trust anyone again.
那么好像你再也不会相信任何人。
As though you're inside the most interesting place.
好像你在最有趣的地方里面。
